# PLAYER::GET_PLAYER_INDEX

## Summary
Gets the player index for the main player

## Returns
* **PLAYER_INDEX**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the same as PLAYER_ID and NETWORK_PLAYER_ID_TO_INT
